channel.title: Tutorials on jurjen.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on jurjen.dev

item.title: Introduction
item.description: In this series we will explore the basics of HTML, Javascript, CSS and web development by creating a cool tutorial website using the Hugo static website generator.

item.title: Getting Started!
item.description: When you write more than a few pages of HTML, you quickly get tired of the nonsense. Which is why Markdown was build. We will look at the Hugo site generator to fold markdown articles into a functional website.

item.title: Navigation
item.description: In this tutorial, we will create a simple navigation bar that works for both mobile and desktop browsers. We will look into Hugos Pipelines and do our first bit of Javascript programming.

item.title: Ordering content
item.description: Lets organize the tutorial collection using article tags and tutorial series. Along the way we discover Hugo’s archetypes, front matter and ‘taxonomies’.
